The Application Utilities Package

The Application Utilities package contains tools that are useful for application developmentwith SAMRAI. Currently, the package has two subdirectories containing:
  1. Support for physical boundary conditions
  2. Support for Embedded or Immersed boundary representations on Cartesian grids
  3. Utilities for plotting AMR data

All class names in the Application Utilities package are in the namespace "appu".
